title: Custom launchers partly broken with Android 11
content:
I'm a long-term user of Nova Launcher (if you're curious, because of how limited and google business driven the default launcher is). After update to Android 11 there are at least two serious problems:
Swiping up to access the running apps no longer works at all from the home screen.
Swiping up from an application works, but if you return to home screen from it, you'll end up with the google launcher until you lock the phone and unlock it again.
Is this problem known to Android developers?
